text: @LaraLeaTrump @realDonaldTrump Dude you missed the point BIG TIME!. If there were an effective treatment for Coronavirus the lockdowns would end! There will never be an effective treatment as long as its politically expedient. November at least if ever. The question is who is fooling who and who is complicit.
